snippet: On Feb. 3, Jeremy Lin looked like an overmatched, easily rattled, mistake-prone reserve. On Feb. 4, he looked like a polished N.B.A. star, as Linsanity began.
abstract: New York Knicks guard Jeremy Lin, one game prior to playing like a polished NBA star and becoming a breakout sensation, played an error-prone six and a half minutes against the Boston Celtics where he looked like an overmatched, easily rattled reserve.
lead_paragraph: On Feb. 3, Jeremy Lin looked like an overmatched, easily rattled, mistake-prone reserve. On Feb. 4, he looked like a polished N.B.A. star, as Linsanity began.

headline.seo: Just Before His Breakout, Lin Struggled Mightily
headline.main: The Pains Before a Star Was Born
headline.print_headline: The Pains Before A Star Was Born
